meta.description: CSH labels for the WEC Assessment Frontend Plugin

languageKey.label: Determines the order in which the questions appear in the Frontend.
Options include Random and Use Backend Sorting. The Backend Sorting option will display the order of the questions based on their order in the List Module.
Spreads questions across multiple pages with a progress bar at the top of each page.
If paging is enabled, the number of questions that appear on each page.
The lowest score possible for an answer. Typically 0 or 1.
The highest score possible for an answer.

This will be determined by what sort of continuum you are using for scoring the assessment. If your answers will be "Never, Sometimes, Often" enter either the number 2 or 3, depending on whether the minimum score is 0 or 1.
The number of labels you can add to the assessment answers will be determined by the Minimum and Maximum Answer Values you chose on the General Tab. You must provide a label for each value.
